channel.title: Setting up a LINUX server?
channel.description: im planning on getting a linux vps, but how do i set it up? is it the same as windows except for the no-ip DUC or something? PLEASE HELP willing to rep++ and MAYBE give some money

item.title: Setting up a LINUX server?
item.dc:creator: @pkpoison pkpoison
item.description:
@pkpoison wrote:

Don’t buy a linux VPS i bought one the other day and it won’t work with my server buy windows.

Read full topic

item.title: Setting up a LINUX server?
item.dc:creator: @I_need_a_username I need a username
item.description:
@I_need_a_username wrote:

Be sure you have java! lol
Open notepad:
And type, or copy & paste this to it:
#!/bin/bash

cd bin && java -Xmx1024M server

Save it as run.sh
You can just change Server to whatever it opens to start the server, BTW, heres compile.sh

#!/bin/bash

You must put this into the terminal before You can compile!

"chmod +x compile.sh && chmod +x run.sh

javac -classpath . -d bin *.java -g

Hope that helps! =]

Read full topic
